thread.title: Kim Kardashian Lied to Kanye West About This One Little Thing
thread.title_full: Kim Kardashian Lied to Kanye West About This One Little Thing

author: Celebuzz
title: Kim Kardashian Lied to Kanye West About This One Little Thing
text:
Kim Kardashian Lied to Kanye West About This One Little Thing Celebuzz | February 13, 2017 - 5:07 pm Share < br />this article: Advertisement 
Kim Kardashian may have told Kanye West a little white lie when he infamously made her throw out her old clothes during an episode of Keeping Up with the Kardashians . 
According to the reality star, she actually kept most of her wardrobe and hid them away from her husband in hopes that their daughter, North West , will have use for them one day. 
PressRoomVIP reports: 
Kim took to Snapchat to show off her shoe and clothing collection. She revealed that when Kanye told her to get rid of things, she secretly kept everything! She said that she wanted to save her collection for when she had a daughter of her own! “The fun part is I kept everything… all for memories. Even when Kanye thought he cleaned out my closet, I kept it all secretly for my daughter one day,” Kim says.
